name: Hemkunt Foundation
text: Have been helping out with Oxygen Cylinders. 80G donation receipts available.

name: ACT Grants
text: Have been helping with distribution of oxygen. Run by Indian startup ecosystem. International donations also accepted.

name: Feeding From Far
text: Have been feeding the poor and unemployed who are struggling to feed themselves during the lockdown. Accepts international payments.

name: Swasth
text: Are procuring oxygen concentrators and channeling them to hospitals in India.

name: Zomato Feeding India
text: Are providing hospitals and patients with oxygen and related supplies for free. Accepts international payments.

name: Goonj
text: Providing essentials like ration and hygiene material, with dignity, to daily wagers, migrant workers and people struggling for the basics in the villages of India. Eligible for tax deduction of 50% u/s 80G.

name: Enrich Lives Foundation
text: Providing grocery kits and meals to the poor communities.

name: Paytm Foundation
text: Is raising â‚¹10 crores to donate Oxygen Concentrators across India. They'll match the contributions received through this initiative.
